properties.displayName: Potential Persistence Via Outlook LoadMacroProviderOnBoot Setting
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData contains "0x00000001" and RegistryKey endswith "\\Outlook\\LoadMacroProviderOnBoot"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the modification of Outlook setting "LoadMacroProviderOnBoot" which if enabled allows the automatic loading of any configured VBA project/module
